hero.title: How to use the software
hero.description: Remember, this tool is not a magic number generator, but a support system designed to help you play with a strategy based on tested and proven statistics. Additionally, the artificial intelligence integrated into the algorithm increases the chances of success, but it is crucial to apply the method carefully and manage your budget responsibly.

concepts.title: Basic concepts
concepts.subtitle: The strategy combines traditional statistical logic with the aid of Artificial Intelligence. Among the fundamental concepts are:

law_of_large_numbers.title: Law of Large Numbers
law_of_large_numbers.content: The law of large numbers applied to roulette means that, over a very high number of spins, the frequency of numbers or various sections of the table tends to balance out. However, this should not be interpreted as an invitation to bet on "lagging dozens," as the law only works over very long periods. The strategy, therefore, allows you to improve your chances of success when applied correctly alongside other principles.

zero_zone.title: Zero Zone
zero_zone.content: The method primarily focuses on the "ZERO Zone," which includes numbers between 12 and 15. If the percentage of occurrence in this zone is below the average (20%) at both 50 and 500 spins, the zone is considered "lagging." A lag indicates that these numbers are not appearing as expected, creating an imbalance according to the law of large numbers: this could be the ideal time to bet on them.

number_growth.title: Number Growth
number_growth.content: With the help of Artificial Intelligence, numbers in "growth" are identified by analyzing their performance across different time windows (data at 50 and 500 spins). The AI automatically compares numbers with low initial frequency that start to balance over time, suggesting a possible higher probability of occurrence in the next spins. This process occurs autonomously thanks to the algorithmic model embedded in the software.

dozens.content: For dozens, enter the percentages reported in the game table statistics. For the ZERO Zone % take the percentage of the section that includes the zone numbers (between 12 and 15), not the one that simply includes the number 0. Here too, check the data on both 50 and 500 spins. In the example image the statistics are at 50 spins, to view the statistics at 500 spins you need to swipe to the right.

wheel.content: The half wheel of the software allows you to graphically replicate the statistics of the game table. To adjust the filling of the cones, click on one of them and move the cursor to adapt the filling level to the statistics observed on the table. Repeat the process also for the 500 spin statistics.

sequences.title: Sequences
sequences.content: The strategy is based on years of analysis of the sequences that occur in particular statistical conditions. The algorithm automatically detects which numbers are most favored based on current statistics.

number_trends.title: Number trends
number_trends.content: By monitoring the collected data (from 50 to 500 spins), the AI analyzes the numbers in the ZERO Zone to identify the most relevant trends. The concept of 'number growth' is amplified by automated processing, which precisely identifies those numbers that are gradually recovering frequency compared to the initial period.

budget_management.title: Budget management
budget_management.content:
Start with a budget of at least €300 per session. Set a realistic profit target and stop playing once reached.
Start by betting small amounts to test the table and gradually increase in case of winnings. The numbers generated by the software are divided into three betting intensities: yellow (lowest), orange (intermediate) and red (highest).
For example: €1 for each yellow number, €3 for orange numbers and €5 for red numbers. In case of winnings, you can gradually increase the bets.
Avoid continuing to play in case of losses: insisting could cause further damage to your finances. Only play money you can afford to lose.

croupier_attention.title: Attention to the croupier
croupier_attention.content: When you observe a table, also pay close attention to how the croupier performs the spin. The spin should be done by restarting the ball (more or less) at the height of the last number drawn. If, for example, the last number drawn is a 5, the croupier should reverse the turn of the wheel, take the ball and restart it at the height of 5. If he throws the ball too far from the last number drawn or delays in starting the spin, it could compromise the statistical sequences. In these cases, the table should be avoided, even if the conditions seem favorable.

recommended_providers.title: Recommended providers
recommended_providers.content: I recommend Evolution tables, which offer statistics at both 50 and 500 spins, perfectly compatible with this strategy. I do not recommend Playtech tables, as they only show statistics at 100 and 1000 spins, less useful for this method. This demonstrates that providers are also adapting to counter our strategy.

table_screening.title: Table screening
table_screening.content: Learn to quickly identify a favorable (or at least borderline) table by analyzing the statistics independently. This will save you time in compilation and help you choose tables with optimal conditions.

evolution_tables.content: On Evolution tables, click on the camera icon in the top right to change the view: you will be able to quickly select numbers using the ellipse of numbers or the wheel.

view_change.content:
After clicking, the view of the table will change, highlighting the ellipse of numbers and the wheel. We will use these two tools to bet quickly. In fact, the small section at the bottom right (see image) with the number 1 with + above and - below, indicates that by clicking on a number on the ellipse of numbers next to it, the bet will be placed on that number and on the first number immediately above and immediately below. If the number is 2, the bet will be placed on the selected number and on the first 2 numbers immediately above and below. And so on..
If instead you click on the cone of the wheel, the bet will be only on the selected number. With a little practice, this system will be the fastest and most accurate method to replicate the bets indicated by the software.

cta.title: Ready to play?
cta.content:
Get in the game and challenge the roulette, but always remember: this is not a tool that guarantees winnings, rather a guide to play with a reliable method based on statistics. Play in moderation, always be cautious and only play money you can afford to lose!
Good luck!

free_user.title: Basic Concepts in summary
free_user.subtitle: To discover the strategy in detail, purchase a subscription.
free_user.law_content: In the context of roulette, this means that, over a very high number of spins, the probabilities of various numbers and different areas of the table will tend to balance. This obviously doesn't mean just looking at the 'deficient dozen' and betting on those numbers. But this, together with other concepts, forms the foundation of the strategy.
free_user.zero_content: The strategy is developed to work best by exploiting the ZERO zone of the roulette, which includes numbers from 12 to 15. If the percentage of this zone is below average (20%) at both 50 and 500 spins, the zone is considered to be "in deficit". This suggests that the zone is delayed and it might be the right time to bet on its numbers.
free_user.growth_content: Statistics at 50 spins are compared with those at 500 spins to identify numbers showing a positive trend. Growing numbers are those that, at 50 spins, show an increase in frequency when considering a longer period, up to 500 spins. These numbers are considered promising because their increase suggests they are beginning to "recover" the delay and could become more frequent in the next spins.
